title: Windows 7 SP1 IE11 Jun 2014 Lite
description:
Windows 7 SP1 with all updates until 14 June 2014 (incl. latest IE 11.0.9) LITE
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

# BASED ON          = Microsoft.Windows.7.Ultimate.SP1.x86.Integrated.June.2014-
                      Maherz.iso
# ISO SIZE          = 1,24 GB
# INSTALLATION SIZE = 3 GB (without pagefile)
# RAM USAGE AT BOOT = 300 MB
# INSTALLATION MODE = bootable ONLY (no manual setup, no repair, no upgrade)
# BOOT MODE         = BIOS & UEFI (not tested, ISO has EFI folder)
# UI LANGUAGE       = ENGLISH (can't install other UI Languages)
# REGIONAL SETTINGS = all available (Default: Romanian, changeable)
# INCLUDES          = all updates until 14 June 2014 + IE 11.0.9
                    = NO OTHER SOFTWARE, DRIVERS SLIPSTREAMED
                    = DOES NOT include latest DotNet 4.5.2
                      ---> search for "DOTNET 4.5.2 SLIM" version, as it takes
                           less disk space compared to MS original one
# ACTIVATED         = NO (activator not included, use your own activator -
                      recommended: Windows Loader 2.2.1)
# KEPT & WORKING    = WinSAT, Games (all), Disk Cleanup, Disk Defragmenter,
                      Windows Media Player, Wallpapers, Sounds, Cursors, Themes,
                      Codecs (for HTML 5 playback in IE11), Network Browsing &
                      Sharing, Printing & Scan Support (use your own drivers &
                      search on Microsoft Update Catalog by VEN & DEV IDs), USB
                      Mass Storage, Camera & Image Acquisition, Windows Sidebar,
                      Autoplay
# REMOVED           = Accesibility, Troubleshooting, Mobility Center, Projector
                      Connectivity, Speech, Welcome Center, Fax, Windows
                      Defender, Wordpad, Write, Windows Side Show, Floppy
                      Support, Smart Card Support, Language Packs (UI only),
                      IIS, Windows Mail, Homegroup, Security Center, Media
                      Center, Disk Quota, On-Screen Keyboard, winsxs (some
                      updates might fail), XPS, Tablet PC, System Restore
                      Powershell
                    = Drivers -- Video, Modem, TV Tuner, Network, Printers,
                      Scanners, Floppy Drive, Smart Card   
# TWEAKS            = Updates OFF, Firewall ON, My Computer Context Menu
                      Shortcuts, Windows Indexing Service OFF, UXTheme Patch,
                      Disable Low Disk Space Warning, Disable Hibernation, Full
                      Information During Shutdown, Maximum IE Downloads 20,
                      Organisation Home
# UNATTENDED        = YES (you can only specify path to install, Username and
                      Computer name)
# TESTED & WORKING  = Office 2010 SP2 Jun 2014, Printing, Scanning, Network
                      Browsing, Microsoft Security Essentials and many other
                      3rd party software

I did this myself after following some guides online, because it was not possible to install IE11 on other Lite versions already made. I used RT7Lite,
Winreducer and some manual tweaks. Unfortunately, vLite doesn't work with SP1
anymore and I couldn't make the install smaller than this.

Enjoy & seed!
